#summary The rel="up" attribute indicates that the referenced document is the parent of the current document in a hierarchical document collection.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

`rel="up"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="up"` attribute on these elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
